channel.title: Occupying Suggestion
channel.description: I think the messages of the occupation should be changed so that no matter what ability is used, you see the same message; something like: `You were occupied last night.`, or something like that. This will be a little bit more "fair" and balanced in my opinion. Also, it would make the **Fireworks** ability of [The Fool](http://tol.wikia.com/wiki/The_Fool) actually useful.

item.title: Occupying Suggestion
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Chancellor:

IMO the abilities of the Fool are actually a joke played by the developers, since if you actually use them then YOU’RE the fool because it reveals your existence.

It only reveals to the person that had it. If I was evil, a good trick would be to immediately say “fireworks! There’s a Fool”. People would be careful about voting off the evil dudes. Just because you say there’s a fool doesn’t necessarily mean there IS one use it to your advantage
